source.b71a55d1: Thus outliers have been removed using rank method.
source.8d8d3c11: We have population of 2020 given and along with female count of 2018, subtracting both columns can give us males approximately.
source.0796b85b: Data has been scarped from various websites, thus every feature would have outliers.
source.e733c3d1: Removing them as Counrty doesn't add any significane to the dataset, and Schools, Qurantine and Restrictions were almost implemnted at same time in world and on average lasted for 90 days, thus having them just increases the linear co-relation making the model biased.
